brand_identity: GroundGame26 is a movement-driven platform designed to amplify the voice of the American patriot. We bridge the gap between traditional GOP infrastructure and the power of local community groups, equipping thousands of volunteers with the technical tools needed to register voters and secure ballots. Together, we are turning belief into action and action into a future of liberty.
core_values: Believe in God, Believe in Yourself, Believe in Each Other
mission_statement: The Republican party is the party of freedom. We encourage voter registration and hold our legislators accountable. We do this because we want each person to have the opportunity to fulfill their purpose in life.
vision_statement: To build a unified front of believers and patriots who ensure the torch of freedom is passed to every generation.
